detail_desc: Long-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a linen and cotton weave with buttons down the front. Patterned bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
Short top in a fine, textured knit with a deep V-neck, drawstring down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Skinny-fit trousers in stretch twill with a visible button fly, fake front pockets and decorative seams at the knees.
Shortie briefs in stretch fabric with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back with low-cut legs. Seamless.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a lined hood and zip at the top that continues around the edge of the hood. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved linen shirt with a grandad collar, classic front, yoke at the back and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in sturdy jersey with wrapover shoulder straps.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Straight-style top in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in slightly stretchy washed denim with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Knee-length dress in stretch jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt. Partly lined.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Short, fitted dress in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and long sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in satin with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and narrow cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves and cuffs with fasteners and a tab and press-stud. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Strapless bandeau bra in lace. Jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and a slit at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in jacquard-weave cotton with adjustable tabs at the sides and a zip fly with a concealed hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal hoop earrings with a pendant. Diameter approx. 5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative, textured stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt with fabric flowers. Lined.

Calf-length dress in airy cotton poplin with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Detachable tie belt at the waist, a flared skirt with pleats for added width, concealed pockets in the side seams and a slit at the back. Unlined.
Lightweight slides with moulded insoles, an adjustable foot strap with a plastic buckle, and fluted soles.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Seam under the bust. Partly lined.
Calf-length trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with side pockets and wide, straight legs. Covered elastication and a wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Jacket and trousers in soft, patterned thermal fleece. Jacket with a stand up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a motif. Longer and rounded at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine knit with block-coloured stripes and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a concealed zip at one side and slim legs.
Non-wired push-up bra top in ribbed jersey with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. No fasteners.
Lined, push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a draped front, sewn-in ties at one side and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Flounced sleeves, a seam at the hips and a gently flared peplum.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Cotton jersey briefs with narrow elastication at the top and a lined gusset.
Hat and scarf set in soft rib-knit wool containing some cashmere. Hat with a turned-up hem. Size of scarf 27x170 cm.
Polo-neck collar in a cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining.
Knee-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric with an elasticated waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Oversized cotton poplin shirt with a collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gentle flare to the hem.
A-line dress in airy modal crêpe with frills around the neckline, cuffs and hem, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Unlined.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.

Long, V-neck dress in a patterned weave with an open section at the back and covered button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with decorative gathers down the sides, a concealed zip at the back, and a slit at the front. Partly lined in satin.
Hooded jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Skinny-fit leggings in printed cotton jersey. Easy pull-on waist with visible elastication.
Cargo shorts in a linen and cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Tunic in a sturdy, jacquard-weave viscose blend with a pattern in shimmering metallic thread. V-neck, a pleat at the back for added width and short, wide sleeves.
Top in a cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tie at the top, gathered seam at the waist, zip in the side and a flare to the hem.
Calf-length dress in a crêped rib knit with a V-neck and rounded spaghetti shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and a raw roll-edge hem. Skirt with a jersey lining.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Romper suit in lightweight, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on the shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Lightly brushed inside.

Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
Shopper in batik-patterned cotton canvas with a zip at the top and two wide handles with fringes at the ends. Unlined. Depth 8 cm. Height 41 cm. Width 54 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit bamboo blend with wide elastication at the tops.
Trousers in woven fabric with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Sleeveless top in airy, jacquard weave viscose with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and covered buttons at the front. Lined at the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and inset, lace-trimmed mesh section at the top. Long sleeves with a wide lace trim at the cuffs.
3/4-length pull-on trousers in an airy, patterned cotton weave with and elasticated waistband with a drawstring. Fake fly, side pockets, one back pocket and elasticated hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a tie-detail hem.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted details. Notch lapels with decorative press-studs, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightweight parka woven in a textured cotton blend. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring and foldover front edge and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hem. Mesh lining.
Coat in woven fabric containing some wool with notch lapels and an additional, detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Lined.

Long trenchcoat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, draped lapels at the front and a loose yoke at the back. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and no buttons. Unlined.
